Bios.description: The Bios schema contains properties related to the BIOS attribute registry.  The attribute registry describes the system-specific BIOS attributes and actions for changing to BIOS settings.  Changes to the BIOS typically require a system reset before they take effect.  It is likely that a client finds the `@Redfish.Settings` term in this resource, and if it is found, the client makes requests to change BIOS settings by modifying the resource identified by the `@Redfish.Settings` term.
Bios.longDescription: This resource shall represent BIOS attributes for a Redfish implementation.

title: #Bios.Bios
